mapper.select: SELECT u.ID, u.NO, u.NAME,u.LOGIN_NAME, u.MOBILE,u.PHONE,u.EMAIL,u.OFFICE_ID, o1.NAME as OFFICE_NAME, u.COMPANY_ID, o2.NAME as COMPANY_NAME, o1.AREA_ID as OFFICE_AREA_ID, o2.AREA_ID as COMPANY_AREA_ID, o1.NAMES FROM SYS_USER u LEFT JOIN SYS_OFFICE o1 ON o1.ID=u.OFFICE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_OFFICE o2 ON o2.ID=u.COMPANY_ID WHERE u.LOGIN_NAME=#{no}
